author: streetcat
title: Hyderabad to Warangal by car
text: # 1 On the coming Sunday, we decided to visit Warangal fort and other interesting places around Warangal. There appears to be two paths for this destination from Hyderabad. One is travelling via Outer Ring Road and the other path is travelling from within the city (Begumpet, Paradise, Uppal, ECIL, etc). Each path has its advantage - ORR path will have less traffic. But if I travel from within the city the distance is less. Can someone suggest which path I should take. And also, I would really appreciate if you can point out good restaurants on the way. I take my only exercise acting as a pallbearer at the funerals of my friends who exercise regularly Â— Mark Twain
